greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nilpotent groups of order n.
comment: Multiplicative with a(p^m) equal to the number of groups of order p^m.
link: T. D. Noe and Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2047 (terms 1..2015 from T. D. Noe)
mathematica: terms = 101; fgc = FiniteGroupCount[Range[terms]]; a[1] = 1; a[n_ /; PrimePowerQ[n] && 1 < n <= terms] := a[n] = fgc[[n]]; a[n_ /; 1 < n <= terms] := a[n] = Times @@ (a[#[[1]]^#[[2]]]& /@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, terms] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 03 2017 *)
results.author: Reiner Martin (reinermartin(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 29 2001
